results.question: 按注册时间降序排列用户
results.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM users u ORDER BY u.registration_date DESC;
results.ground_truth_sql: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC

results.question: 计算订单项总金额
results.generated_sql: SELECT oi.order_id, SUM(oi.subtotal) AS total_amount FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY oi.order_id;
results.ground_truth_sql: SELECT order_id, SUM(subtotal) AS total FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id
